charges.charge_description: Import into the USA from the Republic of Mexico less than 50 kilos, that is, approx. 11 kilos or 25 pounds of marijuana; Title 21 USC 952(a), 960(a)(1), and 960(b)(4) and 18 USC 2; Offense date: 12/03/00; Penalty: Imprisonment for not more than 5 yrs and/or $250,000 fine and at least a 2 yr SRT (1)

Possession w/intent to distribute less than 50 kilos, that is, approx. 11 kilos or 25 pounds of marijuana; Tltle 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(D) and Title 18 USC 2; Offense date: 12/03/00; Penalty: Imprisonment for not more than 5yrs and/or $250, 000 fine and at least a 2 yr SRT (2)
Possession w/intent to distribute marijuana; Importation of controlled substance; smuggling [7:00-m-4175]
